## createKeyboardEvent variable

Creates a keyboard event which can be dispatched into the DOM

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
createKeyboardEvent: (type: KeyboardEventName, options: KeyboardEventInit & PlainObject) => KeyboardEvent
```
